revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Spear Pillar |image = [[File:Spear Pillar.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Spear Pillar |tokens = 96,500 |location = Northeast of Mt. Coronet South, just below the middle of the 'mountain range' in the middle of the map. }} '''Spear Pillar''' is a dungeon in [[Sinnoh]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 1,853,500 |- | Boss || 9,000,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Croagunk * Stunky * Glameow * Bronzor * Golbat * Palkia (boss) * Dialga (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | [[Item Magnet]] || 50% |}
